title: Day to Day Care of Your Horse
brief_description: Captain Mark Phillips makes the young and fairly inexperienced horse person aware of the basic everyday care required to keep one’s horse in top condition. These requirements include: good stabling; field and fencing requirements; a daily routine of grooming etc.; exercise; and general information about veterinary care.
